purpose: The email announces the Call for Papers (CFP) for accepted workshops at the ACM/IEEE 28th International Conference on Model Driven Engineering Languages and Systems (MODELS 2025), which will take place from October 5-10, 2025, in Grand Rapids, Michigan. It highlights that the conference will be a hybrid event allowing both in-person and virtual participation. The email provides details about the workshops, including their objectives, organizers, and links to their respective websites. Important deadlines for submissions, notifications, and camera-ready versions are also included, along with a list of the accepted workshops and their descriptions.

infos:
